value:
$WmMPID_開花ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Bloom01,Face|I was a fool in my youth, yes, but
I learned much over these ten years.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ungh...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Ah, Veronica... There you are.
Are you all right?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|S-Sissy, I...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Listen to me, Veronica. I've been
looking for you. Something terrible
has happened.$k$pYou have been accused of treason.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Treason? Me?!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|They're saying you are a traitor
to your country—that you want
to help Askr destroy Embla.$k$pAnd with the sudden attacks on the
villages across Embla. They say it
was you who ordered them.$k$pPowerful nobles are claiming you
planned this for a long time now,
and that they have proof.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|All lies. I would never wish
suffering on my own people.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Of course you wouldn't. I know
that, and I believe you're telling
me the truth.$k$pThis is a conspiracy against you,
designed to frame you for heinous
crimes against Embla.$k$pIn all likelihood, they have been
planning this strike against you
for some time now...$k$p$EFace_Pain|But...how could we possibly prove
any of that? What counterevidence
do we have?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...And what does Mother believe?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...Her Majesty has ordered you be
apprehended so that the truth might
be ascertained.$k$pI am sorry, Veronica. I have no desire
to harm you... So, please, come with
me, peacefully.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Guh... This voice...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Veronica? Are you all right?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The voice... It won't stop...
I can't fight it! Must...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy,Face|$c255,0,0,255|Kill Askr...$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Veronica, I cannot allow you to
leave here so easi— Veronica!
Where are you going?!$k$p$Sbs150|
